Description: Hi mojang , firstly the game is superb but I have a issue I cant join my friends world and play together nor he can join my world its constantly showing UNABLE TO CONNECT TO THE WORLD we tried several times for atleast a month now please fix this we have tried every possible way but its not working . Please fix this pr just make it like java where multiplayer his in the title screen and we just need the ip adress . Thank you
